note:
Hey there, my name is Chad. I am a native of Chicago, and I am here to tell you that deep-dish pizza is not representative of true Chicago-style pizza. The authentic style is thin-crust tavern-style pizza, which is traditionally cut into squares.

SOX > CUBS - BEAR DOWN!!, Go BULLS - Here Come The Hawks!!

I am also a Great Lake sailor. My weekends during the summer are dedicated to sailing on Lake Michigan, while my winter weekends are probably spent working on the boat or that damn truck!
